testdeck.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a computer program which is used to check a small amount of DATA (=information held by a computer). The results of the calculations are then compared with the results of calculations done by a person to make sure the computer is operating correctly. Testdecks are often used as part of an AUDIT
testdeck.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The testdeck will reveal errors in the income and expenditure account operation.
